# This file is a part of gr-uaslink

########################################################################
# Include python install macros
########################################################################
include(GrPython)
if(NOT PYTHONINTERP_FOUND)
    return()
endif()

add_subdirectory(bindings)

########################################################################
# Install python sources
########################################################################
gr_python_install(FILES 
    __init__.py 
    pymavlink_source_p.py
    pymavlink_sink_p.py
    pymavlink_source_sink_pp.py
    mavlink_control.py
    pdu_control_to_pdu_vector.py
    pdu_vector_to_pdu_control.py
    burst_verification.py 
DESTINATION ${GR_PYTHON_DIR}/gnuradio/uaslink)

########################################################################
# Handle the unit tests
########################################################################
include(GrTest)

set(GR_TEST_TARGET_DEPS gnuradio-uaslink)

# Create a package directory that tests can import. It includes everything
# from `python/`.
add_custom_target(
    copy_module_for_tests ALL
    COMMAND ${CMAKE_COMMAND} -E copy_directory ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
            ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/test_modules/gnuradio/uaslink/)

GR_ADD_TEST(qa_pymavlink_source_p ${PYTHON_EXECUTABLE} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_pymavlink_source_p.py)
GR_ADD_TEST(qa_pymavlink_sink_p ${PYTHON_EXECUTABLE} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_pymavlink_sink_p.py)
GR_ADD_TEST(qa_pymavlink_source_sink_pp.py ${PYTHON_EXECUTABLE} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_pymavlink_source_sink_pp.py)
GR_ADD_TEST(qa_mavlink_control ${PYTHON_EXECUTABLE} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_mavlink_control.py)
GR_ADD_TEST(qa_pdu_control_to_pdu_vector ${PYTHON_EXECUTABLE} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_pdu_control_to_pdu_vector.py)
GR_ADD_TEST(qa_pdu_vector_to_pdu_control ${PYTHON_EXECUTABLE} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_pdu_vector_to_pdu_control.py)
GR_ADD_TEST(qa_burst_verification ${PYTHON_EXECUTABLE} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_burst_verification.py)
